mapper.insert: INSERT INTO educations (user_id, school_name, education_level, major, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{schoolName}, #{educationLevel}, #{major}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE educations SET school_name = #{schoolName}, education_level = #{educationLevel}, major = #{major}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
